short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents activations and swaps on Sprint prepaid sales portal from web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* This extension is intended for internal use by Sprint and Boost Mobile associates

The goal of this extension is to prevent activations and swaps from outside Elevate
The reason for this is to prevent disaster with residuals and rebates from corporate
Please load this extension on to all store computers utilizing Elevate to prevent disaster

* There is nothing confidential in nature about this extension and as such this extension has been made open for the public to use and consume as it may benefit other people
